patthana24.6:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana24.6:0.3_0: And there are bonfire in the forep, and bigger.
patthana24.6:1.1_0: Not because of the basis for the cause, conditioned by which that arises dependent on the reason for the arising of a thought.
patthana24.6:10.1_0: Nor do they cause the mind.
patthana24.6:11.1_0: Neither understood the mind is a cause of the mind. Since the mind is a reason for the sake of mental processes. ...
patthana24.6:12.1_0: Since not for the sake of purification of mind is for the sake of purification of mind. Since doesn’t give rise to a cause,
patthana24.6:13.1_0: Clinging the mind isn’t the cause of the mind.
patthana24.6:14.1_0: Not wanting to listen to the teaching, not for the sake of thought.
patthana24.6:15.1_0: Nevertheless, they don’t cause the reason for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana24.6:16.1_0: Nevertheless, they don’t swapped with the thought that gives rise to mind.
patthana24.6:17.1_0: No cause for the sake of purification of mind. Purification of mind gives rise to mental processes. Form for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana24.6:18.1_0: Not because of their mind, they don’t fall into the principle of ill will for the sake of purification by mind.
patthana24.6:19.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the mind.
patthana24.6:2.1_0: Not because of the support, the support that arises conditioned by the thought that gives rise to a principle.
patthana24.6:20.1_0: Without applying the mind to understand the picture with mind, they don’t look forward to the sake of their mind.
patthana24.6:21.1_0: Not for the sake of their minds stemming from disorders of the mind.
patthana24.6:22.1_0: Neither by pleasurable mind, not for the sake of purification of mind; for the sake of bile, not from disorders of mind.
patthana24.6:23.1_0: Not knowingly seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of purification of thought gives rise to causes.
patthana24.6:24.1_0: Not seeing the cause of the reason for the sake of a cause, the reason for the sake of outsider.
patthana24.6:25.1_0: For the sake of nature doesn’t give rise to thought: a cause of reason.
patthana24.6:26.1_0: Not knowing that cause, the reason for the sake of a cause, not a reason.
patthana24.6:27.1_0: nor for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of the teaching.
patthana24.6:28.1_0: Neither thought nor appropriately for the sake of investigating, causes and reasons.
patthana24.6:28.1_2: Three private parts his path excitement.
patthana24.6:3.1_0: Not knowing the thought of the mind.
patthana24.6:4.1_0: Not seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of the mind, not for the sake of thought.
patthana24.6:5.1_0: Neither nonsensical nor mental phenomena give rise to mental phenomena.
patthana24.6:6.1_0: Nor makes them long by for the sake of debates, not for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana24.6:7.1_0: Not wanting to endeavor of the mind, the cause of mental processes.
patthana24.6:8.1_0: Not committed to the pushing mind, not for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana24.6:9.1_0: Not knowing the cause of the mind, the reason for the sake of purification of mind gives rise to mind.
